2057270.name: Fantasy Grounds - Arcadia Issue 003
2057270.description:
Arcadia Issue 003

Welcome to
ARCADIA! Inspired by old-school tabletop magazines, ARCADIA is MCDM's digital magazine for 5th edition GMs and players. We hope you like it!
The Dream Kin by Justice Arman . These are three new dreamy ancestries for your fifth edition characters:
Lucidlings : Aberrations dream these beings into existence! The telepathic lucidling can assume otherworldly forms.
Sand Speakers : Born from radiant fire and astral sands, sand speakers can enter your dreams, Inception-style, and turn into a sentient pile of sand.
Somnians : The creators of dreams, somnians can assume terrifying nightmare forms and give their lives to raise the dead.

Ten Spells You Need in 5e from Celeste Conowitch . This article presents ten spells from previous editions of the game updated for fifth edition, including glitterdust, nature's ladder, and permanency.

Aces High by Sam Mannell . Prepare for dramatic highs and crash-and-burn lows as we bring you new rules for dogfighting aerial combat. Plus an encounter on the back of a dragon!

A Diamond in the Rough from Alison Huang . This roleplay-heavy adventure for 3rd-level characters asks the heroes to find a jewel thief in a family manor. You can drop it into any game.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Matthew Colville, Shane Parker, and George Taray
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
